title: [估國家][你真識食]41歲中年男人強姦81歲老婦

replies.msg:
Pensioner, 81, is raped after being followed by man after she got off a bus on a bustling high street
Victim attacked shortly after she'd left bus in Balham High Road, south London
A 41-year-old man was arrested in Tooting and charged with rape and kidnap
Metropolitan Police appeal for information on whereabouts of victim's jacket
An 81-year-old woman was raped by a man who followed her after she got off a bus on a busy high street.
The victim was taken to hospital following the attack, which happened shortly after she had left the number 155 bus in Balham High Road, south London, at 8.30pm on Friday.
A 41-year-old man was arrested in Tooting on Saturday and charged with two counts of rape and one of kidnap or false imprisonment on Sunday, Scotland Yard said.
He will appear at Wimbledon Magistrates' Court on Monday.
Before his arrest, Metropolitan Police appealed for information on the whereabouts of the victim's jacket.
Detective Inspector Melissa Laremore said: 'My team are keen to trace a male witness seen on Rinaldo Road, Balham, on the evening of the incident.
'He was wearing a jacket with a distinctive American flag design on the back.
'I would urge him to come forward and contact police. In addition to this, the victim's distinctive red Marks and Spencer's jacket went missing after the attack.

'My investigators are working to trace it in and around the local area as it is of important evidential value. If you have any knowledge of its whereabouts, please get in touch.'




Read more: http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-4218344/Pensioner-81-raped-followed-man-bus.html#ixzz4YYjhRU3e
London +1

41歲（古道熱腸）

好名
